segments.text: : How are you , Mr . Ding ? I ’ m John Brown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleased to meet you , Mr . Brown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please have a seat . I know our employment officer has already given you the information about your employee contract , but I ’ d like to go over the main details again before signing the contract . First , you ’ ll be getting a monthly salary , with one month paid vacation after one year of service . No probation is involved .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ ll be covered by our medical plan while on duty . Since you ’ ll be middle-anagement , you , re expected to be available up to one hour past normal working hours . Any approved overtime that will be paid at time , which you can take as salary or time off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A reasonable number of sick days will be covered by the company . Any extended illness will be covered by insurance . Have you read the other terms of the contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just one . I noticed an item about flextime . Is that a possibility for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes it is , but you ’ ll have to discuss the details with your manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Now , if you ’ ll just sign here , you can start work in 3 days .
segments.speaker: S2
